alert.note: Alert for Mason (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Mason County through 200 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hilda, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hedwigs Hill, Loyal Valley, Hilda and Us-87 Near The Mason- Gillespie County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
